messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Fw: Calling Tom Ridge
messages.msgSnippet: No- it didn t come through!! I m am so laughing over this!! Sorry, Janis Fwd: Calling Tom RidgeSubject: Fw: Calling Tom Ridge I know this is completely off
messages.messageBody:
No- it didn't come through!! I'm am so laughing over this!!
Sorry,
Janis



Fwd: Calling Tom RidgeSubject: Fw: Calling Tom Ridge


I know this is completely off topic---but I love things like this. This cracked me up!!
To: Dept. of Homeland Security

Dear Sirs:

I am writing to you for further instructions as to what the next step is for me to take in protecting my family from possible attacks by terrorists.

I have my duck taped...now what?








[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
